h2_title: Boss Fight - Erlang, the Sacred Divinity
content: Once you’ve removed a fourth of his health bar, Erlang will vanish before trying to ambush from above. When the fight resumes, he’ll get a little faster, and start blocking attacks, which is when you should try throwing more heavy attacks into the mix.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Forest_of_Wolves_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Prologue', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Erlang, the Sacred Divinity'.
The content is as follows:
Once you’ve removed a fourth of his health bar, Erlang will vanish before trying to ambush from above. When the fight resumes, he’ll get a little faster, and start blocking attacks, which is when you should try throwing more heavy attacks into the mix.
